txt.en: Along the banks of the Swiftwater is the small lumber-milling settlement of Direnfirel, near Middlemead. Since the evacuation of Edoras not many were left to defend the settlement and it has fallen to the enemy.
'I was right. Saws and axes do not hurt small ones. Curious.'
Quickbeam has asked you to destroy the leader of the enemy force.

'Saruman has destroyed much of Fangorn. Even now, the remnants of his forces still operate a mill, chopping and cutting more of my friends. I dare not approach, for it would quickly destroy me. But you are not made of wood and saws should not hurt you.\n\n'Speak to me again and I will show you how to reach Direnfirel.'
You should return to Quickbeam and inform him of your success.\n\nQuickbeam can be found at Derndingle.
You gather your things and prepare to travel to Direnfirel.
Defeated the leader of the enemies within Direnfirel
'This Horse will see you to the shores near Direnfirel.\n\n'Hurry! The longer the enemy commands Direnfirel, the greater the risk to the lumber and trees we keep there.'
You hear Cwichelm shout from across the yard, 'this Horse will take you to the milling-settlement of Direnfirel, if you still have unresolved matters there.'
Defeat the leader of the enemies within Direnfirel
Direnfirel: Guide of the Wooded River-bank
